arts.ttl: Andoni Iraola is sure that Man City are a ‘very, very good team’
arts.sum: “I think the other day against Villa, they played a very good game after to beat these kind of teams, Villa scored from a set piece. So I think just beating them for first time it was like, okay, it's possible in a certain day where we play very well, probably they don't have their best day.

arts.ttl: Guardiola: Haaland and Rodri are ready and could return to face Bournemouth
arts.sum: On Haaland, Guardiola said: “Yes [he is ready to play].” “I think he will be ready to help,” Guardiola said.
